summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the defeasance and redemption of certain of the City's outstanding Limited Tax General Obligation Improvement and Refunding Bonds, 2003; creating and transferring funds into a defeasance account in the Bond Fund; authorizing the execution of a defeasance trust agreement; authorizing the purchase of certain investments and the use of their proceeds; authorizing the call for redemption prior to maturity of defeased bonds; and appropriating amounts in the defeasance account to carry out the defeasance, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
